attributes.action: Allow students to use their train passes on the buses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Me and my friends pay £200 a term to travel to college everyday. We often need to get the bus to catch our train home, as if we miss it, we have to wait another hour for the next one. We feel that we should be able to use our train passes on the buses because we are only students and pay enough for travel as it is!
